mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) "RESULT" FROM TB_PRODUCT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_CATEGORY USING(PDT_CATEG_NO) WHERE PDT_CTEG = #{pdtCteg} AND PDT_FAMILY = 'B' AND PDT_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(1) "RESULT" FROM TB_WISHLIST WHERE PDT_NO = #{pdtNo} AND USER_NO = #{userNo}
SELECT COUNT(1) "RESULT" FROM TB_CART WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND PDT_NO = #{pdtNo}
SELECT NVL(PDT_OPTION_STOCK, 0) FROM TB_PRODUCT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_OPTION USING(PDT_NO) WHERE PDT_NO = #{pdtNo} AND PDT_OPTION_NO = #{pdtOptionNo} AND PDT_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT PDT_NO, PDT_NAME, PDT_INTRO, PDT_DESCRIPTION, PDT_MANUFAC, PDT_FILE_PATH || '/' || PDT_FILE_UPLOAD "PDT_IMG_SRC", REVIEW_AVG FROM TB_PRODUCT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_CATEGORY USING(PDT_CATEG_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT_FILE USING(PDT_NO) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT
NVL(SUM(ORDER_QUANTITY), 0) "TOTAL_SALES",
NVL(SUM(W.USER_NO), 0) "TOTAL_WISH",
PDT_NO, AVG(NVL(REVIEW_SCORE, 0)) "REVIEW_AVG"
FROM TB_PRODUCT LEFT JOIN TB_REVIEW USING(PDT_NO)
LEFT JOIN TB_ORDER_PRODUCT USING(PDT_NO) LEFT JOIN
TB_ORDER_DETAIL USING(ORDER_DETAIL_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_PAY USING(PAY_NO)
LEFT JOIN TB_WISHLIST W USING(PDT_NO)
WHERE
PAY_STATUS = 'Y' AND
REVIEW_STATE = 'Y' OR REVIEW_STATE IS NULL GROUP BY PDT_NO ) USING(PDT_NO) WHERE PDT_CTEG = #{pdtCteg} AND PDT_FAMILY = 'B' AND PDT_STATUS = 'Y' AND PDT_FILE_INDEX = 0 ORDER BY
TOTAL_SALES DESC,
TOTAL_WISH DESC,
PDT_NO DESC

SELECT PDT_NO, PDT_NAME, PDT_INTRO, PDT_DESCRIPTION, PDT_SHIPPING, PDT_COUNT, PDT_CATEG_NO, PDT_MANUFAC, PDT_GROUP, PDT_FILE_NO, PDT_FILE_INDEX, PDT_FILE_PATH || '/' || PDT_FILE_UPLOAD "PDT_DETAIL_IMG_SRC", PDT_OPTION_NO, PDT_OPTION_FIRST,
PDT_OPTION_SECOND,
PDT_OPTION_PRICE, PDT_OPTION_STOCK FROM TB_PRODUCT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_FILE USING(PDT_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT_CATEGORY USING(PDT_CATEG_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT_OPTION USING(PDT_NO) WHERE PDT_NO = #{pdtNo} AND PDT_STATUS = 'Y' AND PDT_FAMILY = 'B'

SELECT PDT_NAME, PDT_OPTION_NO, PDT_NO, PDT_OPTION_FIRST, PDT_OPTION_SECOND, PDT_OPTION_PRICE, PDT_OPTION_STOCK FROM TB_PRODUCT_OPTION JOIN TB_PRODUCT USING(PDT_NO) WHERE PDT_NO = #{pdtNo} AND PDT_STATUS = 'Y' AND PDT_OPTION_STOCK > 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_WISHLIST ( PDT_NO, USER_NO ) VALUES ( #{pdtNo}, #{userNo} )
INSERT INTO TB_CART(CART_NO, USER_NO, PDT_NO, PDT_OPTION_NO, CART_QUANTITY) VALUES (SEQ_CART.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{pdtNo}, #{pdtOptionNo}, #{cartAddingQuantity})
